raw_body: DOROTHY CONYTA PERERA JAYASEKARA (Retired Teacher) – Beloved wife of late L.A.D.R. Jayasekara (Retired Education Officer),​ loving mother of Manoranjanie (Retired from CEA),​ Manoraj (Australia),​ mother-in-law of Gamini (Union Chemicals Lanka PLC) and Mala (Australia),​ loving grandmother of Deshani,​ Jayani,​ Mudith & Kasuni. Her remains will be at the Respect,​ Borella (Jayarathna) on Monday 8.30 a.m. to 4.00 p.m. Cremation will be held at General Cemetery Borella (New Crematorium) on Monday March 25th 2024 at 4.30 p.m.021020
